short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Summarizes Text, URLs and YouTube videos.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Using the Summarize This Chrome Extension you can quickly summarize any text, url or youtube video in a few seconds.

To fully use the Chrome Extension you'll need to buy a license key from https://maail.lemonsqueezy.com/

License Key Options:
- Summarize This Lifetime: Which is a one time purchase where you can use your own Open AI Key to Summarize
- Summariz This Pro Subscriptions: You can try out the Chrome Extension for FREE with our free trials
